location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Wedderburn, Accountant General and Civil Auditor, Political Department, Bombay to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a copy of a letter from James Henderson, Secretary to the Government, Bombay to John Wedderburn, dated 8 October 1818, which confirms that the Governor of Bombay has approved of Mohamed Hoossine's Khan's [Muḥammad Ḥusayn Khān] application for his family to draw money at Bushire and Surat.
